text: He da'uda! Ami tomake prthibite pratinidhi karechi, ata'eba, tumi manusera majhe n'yayasangatabhabe rajatba kara ebam kheyala-khusira anusarana karo na. Ta tomake allahara patha theke bicyuta kare debe. Niscaya yara allahara patha theke bicyuta haya, tadera jan'ye rayeche kathora sasti, e karane ye, tara hisabadibasake bhule yaya.
